doc.field: There's almost always a line outside Dottie's, because the patient clientele knows it will be well-fed. Generous...
Big portions and homemade bread at this sweet and popular breakfast spot in the Tenderloin.
The rumors are true: Lunch is served here. But visit Dottie's for her legendary breakfast menu. You'll never leave...
Great breakfasts and homemade pastries mean this cozy spot is always packed.
